class_notes: The Applied Practicum course must be completed within an academic semester. A minimum of 2.5 hours/week and no more than 20 hours/week during the spring semester is required for the applied practical experience. The goals are to apply academic concepts to complex organizational challenges, acquire or expand knowledge of the industry, and receive feedback on the integration of academic knowledge and communication skills in the workplace.  A final paper is required in which the student discusses application of knowledge from coursework that was applied.  Additionally, students must include a plan of using tools and techniques from the academic and practicum experiences in their post-graduation plan.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the One-Year or Two-Year MBA program.
